name: CappedYieldDollarLongShortPairFinancialProductLibrary
description: Capped Yield Dollar Long Short Pair Financial Product Library.

functionDecorators.name: percentageLongCollateralAtExpiry
functionDecorators.description: Returns a number between 0 and 1e18 to indicate how much collateral each long and short token are entitled to per collateralPerPair.

parameterDecorators.name: expiryPrice
parameterDecorators.description: price from the optimistic oracle for the LSP price identifier.

returnDecorators.description: expiryPercentLong to indicate how much collateral should be sent between long and short tokens.

functionDecorators.name: setLongShortPairParameters
functionDecorators.description: Enables any address to set the low price range for an associated financial product. above the lowPriceRange the contract will payout a fixed amount of lowPriceRange*collateralPerPair (i.e the "notional" of the yield dollar).Note: a) Any address can set these parameters b) existing LSP parameters for address not set. c) low price range can only be set once to prevent the deployer from changing the parameters after the fact. d) For safety, a low price range should be set before depositing any synthetic tokens in a liquidity pool. e) longShortPair must expose an expirationTimestamp method to validate it is correctly deployed.

parameterDecorators.name: lowPriceRange
parameterDecorators.description: low price range below which the payout transforms from a yield dollar to a short put option.
